TextEng: Feckle Raspude was considered one of the most unusual gnomes of his generation. A swashbuckler with a flair for attracting attention, Feckle drove the young, gnomish ladies wild, with his lopsided grin and impudent behavior. Many a young glory-hunting gnome challenged Feckle to a dual, but the magic of his rapier quickly dispatched his naysayers into gentle slumber. A consummate prankster, Feckle humbled his opponents with practical jokes that were simply unbeatable.
Text: 페클 라스퓨드는 그의 세대에서 가장 특이한 노움 중 하나로 여겨졌습니다. 주목을 끄는 재주가 있는 검사로서, 페클은 비뚤어진 미소와 건방진 행동으로 젊은 노움 아가씨들을 열광시켰습니다. 명예를 쫓는 많은 젊은 노움이 페클에게 결투를 신청했지만, 그의 레이피어의 마법은 비난하는 자들을 부드러운 잠에 빠뜨렸습니다. 완벽한 장난꾸러기인 페클은 도저히 이길 수 없는 장난으로 상대를 굴욕시켰습니다.

TextEng: If rumors of Calimshite ancestry are true, then this scimitar is likely the product of the genies that founded the city long ago. All of the raging heat of the desert seems to be captured within the blade of the sword. Tales of enemies surrendering after merely a scratch only seem untrue until one has tasted the blistering pain the Desert Wind causes a wound.
Text: 칼림샨 혈통의 소문이 사실이라면, 이 시미터는 오래전 도시를 세운 지니들의 작품일 가능성이 높습니다. 사막의 모든 맹렬한 열기가 검의 칼날 안에 담겨있는 듯합니다. 적들이 긁힌 상처만으로도 항복했다는 이야기는 사막의 바람이 상처에 주는 물집 잡히는 고통을 맛보기 전에는 거짓으로 보일 뿐입니다.

TextEng: The twisted mind of Nolls the evil enchanter, created the Fey Duster short sword. His masterwork was made by crushing the bodies of captured pixies to gather the dust that enhances this weapon. While it is widely believed that the dust itself causes some opponents to fall insensate, some druids claim that it is the death screams of the mutilated pixies, overpowering the minds of those struck down.
Text: 사악한 마법부여사 놀스의 뒤틀린 정신이 요정털이 단검을 만들었습니다. 그의 걸작은 포획한 픽시의 몸을 으깨어 이 무기를 강화하는 가루를 모아 만들었습니다. 널리 알려진 바로는 가루 자체가 일부 상대를 의식불명으로 만든다고 하지만, 일부 드루이드들은 훼손된 픽시들의 죽음의 비명이 쓰러진 자들의 정신을 압도한다고 주장합니다.

TextEng: During one of her frequent sojourns into the realm of shadows, Cendra -- a shadowdancer who could slip in and out of the shadows even during the brightest of days -- became ensnared on the webs of a wraith spider. Luckily for her, if being captured in the first place could be considered lucky, she found this shortsword stuck beside her. With a dexterous tug she pulled the blade free and punctured the wraith spider's belly with it. She used the keen blade to shave herself free of the webs. She and the blade were lost when she joined an expedition into the Underdark.
Text: 그림자의 영역으로 자주 다니던 중, 센드라 -- 가장 밝은 낮에도 그림자 속을 드나들 수 있는 그림자 무용수 -- 는 망령 거미의 거미줄에 걸렸습니다. 다행히도, 애초에 잡힌 것이 행운이라면, 그녀는 옆에 박힌 이 단검을 발견했습니다. 민첩한 동작으로 칼날을 빼내 망령 거미의 배를 찔렀습니다. 그녀는 날카로운 칼날로 거미줄을 잘라 탈출했습니다. 그녀와 검은 언더다크 원정에 합류한 후 소식이 끊겼습니다.

TextEng: Bongo 1
Bongo 2
Undead, All Encounter

This container is required to be placed in any module that uses the crafting feat and skill system that comes with Neverwinter Nights: Hordes of the Underdark.

There needs to be exactly one instance of this container in your module.

Just place this container in an area that is not accessible for players.
Text:
이 컨테이너는 네버윈터 나이츠: 어둠의 군주와 함께 제공되는 제작 재주 및 기술 시스템을 사용하는 모든 모듈에 배치해야 합니다.

모듈에 이 컨테이너가 정확히 하나만 있어야 합니다.

플레이어가 접근할 수 없는 지역에 이 컨테이너를 배치하세요.

TextEng: You dream...
"I want to ask you something else."
The small, fairy-like creature darts toward you and then away again in surprise. It seems to be both fascinated and frightened by you at the same time.
Text: 작고 요정 같은 생명체가 당신에게 달려왔다가 놀라서 다시 멀어집니다. 동시에 당신에게 매료되면서도 무서워하는 것 같습니다.

TextEng: "Who are you? You don't work for the ogre, do you? Oh, I so hope not!"
Text: "누구야? 오우거 부하 아니지? 오, 아니길 정말 바라!"

TextEng: The small fairy zips back and forth, hesitantly. "Oooo, if only I could believe you! Maybe you here to kill the fairy queen! That would be bad."
Text: 작은 요정이 망설이며 이리저리 쏜살같이 날아다닙니다. "우우, 믿을 수만 있다면! 어쩌면 요정 여왕을 죽이러 온 거 아냐! 그러면 큰일이야."

TextEng: "Ooohhh," the fairy cries, flittering about, "the fairy queen told me I was supposed to look out for new people like you, and here you are!"
Text: "오오오," 요정이 팔랑거리며 외칩니다, "요정 여왕님이 너처럼 새로운 사람을 찾으라고 했는데, 여기 있네!"

TextEng: "But I forget what I was supposed to do when I see you! How awful! How terrible! I don't like Undermountain! It is dark and scary and gloomy!"
Text: "근데 널 보면 뭘 해야 하는지 까먹었어! 끔찍해! 무서워! 언더마운틴 싫어! 어둡고 무섭고 우울해!"

TextEng: "Eeek! You do work for the ogre, you do!!"
"You want me to leave? But... what if that isn't what the fairy queen wanted me to do?"
Text: "내가 가라고? 근데... 요정 여왕님이 원하는 게 그게 아니면?"

TextEng: The fairy wavers for a moment, then apparently comes to a decision. "I'll go ask the fairy queen what I'm to do, then! That's it! That's what I'll do!" Without another word, she flies off.
Text: 요정이 잠시 망설이다가 결정을 내린 것 같습니다. "그럼 요정 여왕님께 뭘 해야 하는지 물어볼게! 그래! 그렇게 할 거야!" 더 이상 말없이 날아갑니다.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> "No you don't! I... I would have seen you! That's right! I would have seen you! Why would you say such a thing?!"
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> "거짓말! 나... 나라면 봤을 거야! 맞아! 봤을 거란 말야! 왜 그런 말을 해?!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> "You do?" She bobs uncertainly. "But I've never seen you before. But if you say you do..."
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> "그래?" 불확실하게 흔들거립니다. "근데 전에 본 적 없는데. 근데 네가 그렇다면..."

TextEng: The fairy flutters about excitedly. "Okay, I will go! But you must remember to watch for the ogre mage and his minions! They will destroy us all unless we fight them!"
Text: 요정이 신나서 팔랑거립니다. "좋아, 갈게! 근데 오우거 마법사랑 부하들 조심해야 해! 안 싸우면 우리 다 죽어!"

TextEng: "Okay!" She starts to dart away, but suddenly stops. "Wait! If... if you work for the fairy queen, how do you not know where she is?"
Text: "알았어!" 쏜살같이 가려다 갑자기 멈춥니다. "잠깐! 만약... 요정 여왕님 부하면, 어떻게 여왕님이 어디 있는지 몰라?"

TextEng: Suddenly horror registers on her tiny face. "No, no! This is not good! You *do* work for the ogre mage, you do! You will try to hurt me!!"
Text: 갑자기 작은 얼굴에 공포가 떠오릅니다. "안 돼, 안 돼! 이거 안 좋아! 역시 오우거 마법사 부하지, 그렇지! 날 해치려고 할 거야!!"

TextEng: The fairy settles on a nearby stone. "You have questions? What sorts of questions? Are they hard questions?"
Text: 요정이 근처 돌에 내려앉습니다. "질문이 있어? 무슨 질문? 어려운 질문이야?"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> The fairy settles on a nearby stone. "You have questions? What sorts of questions? Are they hard questions?"
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 요정이 근처 돌에 내려앉습니다. "질문이 있어? 무슨 질문? 어려운 질문이야?"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> "I can answer questions, if they are not hard... but wait! No, no! The fairy queen would not want me telling things to someone who works for the ogre mage!"
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> "질문에 답할 수 있어, 어렵지 않으면... 근데 잠깐! 안 돼, 안 돼! 요정 여왕님이 오우거 마법사 부하한테 얘기하는 거 원하지 않을 거야!"

TextEng: She zips about with sudden fear and excitement. "And you *do* work for the ogre mage, don't you?! Oh, the fairy queen will be so angry with me, so angry! I've got to get away before you hurt me!!"
Text: 갑자기 두려움과 흥분으로 쏜살같이 날아다닙니다. "그리고 넌 오우거 마법사 부하지, 맞지?! 오, 요정 여왕님이 나한테 엄청 화낼 거야, 엄청! 네가 해치기 전에 도망가야 해!!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> The fairy settles on a nearby stone. "You have questions? What sorts of questions? Are they hard questions?"
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 요정이 근처 돌에 내려앉습니다. "질문이 있어? 무슨 질문? 어려운 질문이야?"

TextEng: "Because he wants to rule this level. He will kill the fairy queen and anyone who tries to stop him. Plus he is very mean and smelly, or so the fairy queen says."
Text: "이 층을 지배하고 싶어하거든. 요정 여왕님이랑 막으려는 사람 다 죽일 거야. 게다가 엄청 심술궂고 냄새나, 요정 여왕님 말로는."

TextEng: "Fighting was never allowed before, but now it is and there is fighting all the time. I wish things went back to how they were."
Text: "예전엔 싸움이 허용 안 됐는데, 이제는 되고 맨날 싸워. 예전으로 돌아갔으면 좋겠어."

TextEng: She shrugs. "I don't know. That is what everyone says. There was a time when fighting was stopped, but not anymore."
Text: 어깨를 으쓱합니다. "몰라. 다들 그렇게 말해. 예전엔 싸움이 멈췄던 때가 있었는데, 이젠 아니야."

TextEng: The fairy looks at you quizzically. "How do you not know of her? She has gathered all of us together to fight against the ogre and his smelly minions."
Text: 요정이 의아하게 쳐다봅니다. "어떻게 여왕님을 몰라? 우리 다 모아서 오우거랑 냄새나는 부하들이랑 싸우게 했는데."

TextEng: "Why we must fight now and never before, I do not know, but the fairy queen says it must be so."
Text: "왜 지금 싸워야 하고 예전엔 안 그랬는지 모르겠지만, 요정 여왕님이 그래야 한대."

TextEng: "A group of what?" She thinks for a moment and then shakes her head. "I haven't seen anyone. But I just came here not long before you arrived."
Text: "뭐 집단?" 잠시 생각하다가 고개를 젓습니다. "아무도 못 봤어. 근데 네가 오기 얼마 전에 여기 왔거든."

TextEng: The fairy ponders for a long moment. "The fairy queen and the ogre mage started fighting. They never did that before."
Text: 요정이 한참 생각합니다. "요정 여왕님이랑 오우거 마법사가 싸우기 시작했어. 예전엔 안 그랬는데."

TextEng: "I don't know. The fairy queen says the ogre wants to rule everything, but she won't let him."
Text: "몰라. 요정 여왕님이 오우거가 다 지배하려 한다는데, 안 내버려 둘 거래."

TextEng: "I was brought here by magic. All of us who come to Undermountain were, and we can never leave. Is that not how you come here?"
Text: "마법으로 여기 왔어. 언더마운틴에 온 우리 다 그랬고, 절대 떠날 수 없어. 너도 그렇게 온 거 아니야?"

TextEng: "You are very strange. I do not think I have seen a creature like you before."
Text: "너 진짜 이상해. 너 같은 생명체 본 적 없는 것 같아."

TextEng: The fairy bobs up and down, pleased. "Good luck to you, then, strange creature! Don't let the smelly ogre hurt you!"
Text: 요정이 기뻐하며 위아래로 흔들거립니다. "그럼 행운을 빌어, 이상한 생명체! 냄새나는 오우거한테 다치지 마!"

TextEng: "Okay!"
She shrugs. "I don't know. The fairy queen says that none of us can leave, and none of the teleporters work for us, either."
Text: 어깨를 으쓱합니다. "몰라. 요정 여왕님이 우리 중 누구도 떠날 수 없고, 순간이동 장치도 안 된대."

TextEng: "There are places all over Undermountain that bring you from one place to the other. They do not work for us. Lately other things have been coming through them, however."
Text: "언더마운틴 전역에 한 곳에서 다른 곳으로 데려다주는 곳이 있어. 우리한텐 안 되지만. 근데 최근에 다른 것들이 그걸 통해 오고 있어."

TextEng: "Terrible things! Things with many eyes and evil things with dark skin. They kill you if they see you, so we all avoid them."
Text: "무서운 것들! 눈이 많은 것들이랑 검은 피부의 사악한 것들. 보면 죽이니까, 우리 다 피해."

TextEng: "I do not know why they come. And they always go. The fairy queen said they come from somewhere else in Undermountain, but I do not know where."
Text: "왜 오는지 몰라. 그리고 항상 가버려. 요정 여왕님이 언더마운틴 다른 곳에서 온다는데, 어딘지는 몰라."

TextEng: "No. But the fairy queen might."
The fairy shrugs. "I mean the fairy queen and the ogre mage and all the monsters who come here."
Text: 요정이 어깨를 으쓱합니다. "요정 여왕님이랑 오우거 마법사랑 여기 오는 괴물들 전부 말하는 거야."

TextEng: "It changes all the time. Or it used to. Now we have fairies like me and harpies and other smaller things that help the fairy queen."
Text: "맨날 바뀌어. 아니, 그랬었어. 지금은 나 같은 요정이랑 하피랑 요정 여왕님 돕는 작은 것들이 있어."

TextEng: "The ogre mage, he has goblins and trolls and big nasty creatures. They are very mean and smelly."
Text: "오우거 마법사는 고블린이랑 트롤이랑 크고 못된 생명체들이 있어. 엄청 심술궂고 냄새나."

TextEng: "I've never met anyone who didn't come here by magic. Does that mean you can leave, as well? How wonderful that must be!"
Text: "마법으로 안 온 사람은 만난 적 없어. 그러면 너도 떠날 수 있어? 얼마나 좋을까!"

TextEng: "Then I would fly away!" The fairy zips away briefly and then flies back, nervous. "But... you not look like monster. You not want to kill fairy queen, do you?"
Text: "그러면 날아갈 텐데!" 요정이 잠깐 쏜살같이 갔다가 긴장해서 돌아옵니다. "근데... 너 괴물처럼 안 생겼어. 요정 여왕님 죽이려는 거 아니지?"

TextEng: The fairy flies around you nervously. "I talk about the big, mean ogre mage! He tries to kill the fairy queen! He tries to rule everything! How you not know that?"
Text: 요정이 초조하게 당신 주위를 날아다닙니다. "크고 심술궂은 오우거 마법사 얘기야! 요정 여왕님 죽이려고 해! 다 지배하려고 해! 그걸 어떻게 몰라?"

TextEng: The fairy bobs hesitantly. "This? This only be one very, very small part of Undermountain. Undermountain goes very, very deep down into the ground!"
Text: 요정이 망설이며 흔들거립니다. "여기? 여기는 언더마운틴의 아주, 아주 작은 부분일 뿐이야. 언더마운틴은 땅 속으로 아주, 아주 깊이 들어가!"

TextEng: "My name is <FirstName>, and I don't work for anyone."
"Then let me put you out of your misery." <StartAction>[Kill her.]</Start>
"Just leave me alone. I don't need any annoyances flying about."
Text: "그냥 날 내버려 둬. 날아다니며 성가시게 하는 건 필요 없어."

TextEng: "You had your chance to leave. Now I swat you!" <StartAction>[Kill her.]</Start>
Text: "갈 기회는 있었어. 이제 쳐서 잡는다!" <StartAction>[그녀를 죽인다.]</Start>

TextEng: "I don't care what the fairy queen wants. Just go."
Text: "요정 여왕이 뭘 원하든 상관없어. 그냥 가."

TextEng: "How about you take me to the fairy queen, then?"
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Fine, if you want to stay, how about you answer some questions?"
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "좋아, 있고 싶으면, 질문 좀 대답해 줄래?"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Bluff - Lie]</Start> "But I work for the fairy queen, too!"
"Now run along and leave me be."
"Now Take me to the fairy queen."
"Now answer my questions."
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> "Stand still and answer my questions! You're not making any sense!"
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> "가만히 있고 내 질문에 대답해! 무슨 말인지 모르겠어!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Calm down. I just want to ask a few questions."
"Never mind. just leave me alone."
"Why are you frightened of this ogre?"
"What do you mean 'fighting was not allowed'?"
Text: "'싸움이 허용 안 됐다'는 게 무슨 뜻이야?"

TextEng: "Tell me what you know about this fairy queen."
Text: "이 요정 여왕에 대해 아는 거 말해줘."

TextEng: "Did you see a group of adventurers come running through here?"
"Has anything changed in Undermountain recently?"
"Why did they start fighting?"
"Tell me what you know about Undermountain."
"I'm through with questions."
"I can't afford having you tell anyone about me. Sorry." <StartAction>[Kill her.]</Start>
Text: "나에 대해 누군가에게 말하게 둘 수 없어. 미안해." <StartAction>[그녀를 죽인다.]</Start>

TextEng: "Thank you. You've been very helpful."
"Just begone and leave me alone."
"Let me ask something else."
"Why is it you can't leave?"
"The teleporters?"
"Other things, what sorts of things?"
"Do you know who made the magic that brought you here?"
"When you say 'all of us', what do you mean?"
"And what sorts of monsters are those?"
"Not by magic, no."
"And if I did work for the ogre? What would you do?"
Text: "만약 내가 오우거 부하라면? 어떻게 할 건데?"

TextEng: "What ogre are you talking about?"
"This is Undermountain? All of this?"
"It was a monster; get over it."
"A list of men I need to conquer and... well," she licks her lips, "I'm sure you get the idea."
Text: "정복해야 할 남자들 목록이야... 음," 입술을 핥습니다, "무슨 뜻인지 알겠지."

TextEng: "Sure I can, darling. I'm a priestess of Sune, Goddess of Beauty. Besides, I wouldn't do anything more than look and... heal, without your permission."
Text: "물론이지, 자기야. 난 아름다움의 여신 수네의 여사제야. 게다가, 네 허락 없이는 보고... 치료하는 것 외엔 아무것도 안 할 거야."

TextEng: She laughs a high, girlish laugh, "Ah, so young, so eager; I do think I like you. But I suppose we really must keep our mind on saving the city rather than on more... interesting... topics."
Text: 높고 소녀 같은 웃음을 웃습니다, "아, 젊고 열정적이네. 네가 마음에 드는 것 같아. 하지만 더... 흥미로운... 주제보다는 도시를 구하는 데 집중해야겠지."

TextEng: "Your list?"
"Hey! You're a priestess, you can't act like that!"
Text: "이봐! 당신 여사제잖아, 그렇게 행동하면 안 되지!"

TextEng: "That's too bad."
"Sounds interesting. We'll have to try that sometime."
"Your dark elven friend speaks words that are true. I think she could help, so I'll send her down, too."
Text: "네 다크 엘프 친구가 하는 말이 맞아. 도움이 될 것 같으니, 그녀도 내려보낼게."

TextEng: "The last one to sass me was a bold orc named Grug. Ask him what happened, if you know how to speak slug."
Text: "마지막으로 나한테 건방지게 군 녀석은 그룩이라는 대담한 오크였어. 민달팽이 말을 안다면 그에게 무슨 일이 있었는지 물어봐."

TextEng: "You were nothing but a safety device. I created a clone, and put it on ice. I knew that one day I might get into trouble. I'm the real Halaster, you're just my double."
Text: "넌 안전장치에 불과해. 클론을 만들어서 얼려뒀지. 언젠가 문제가 생길 줄 알았거든. 진짜 할라스터는 나야, 넌 그냥 내 분신일 뿐."

TextEng: "I know how you feel, but you're not even real. You're just a double to save me from trouble! It's hard to accept, but I'm afraid that it's true. The original Halaster is me and not you."
Text: "네 기분은 알아, 하지만 넌 진짜도 아니야. 넌 날 문제에서 구하기 위한 분신일 뿐! 받아들이기 어렵겠지만, 사실이 그래. 원래 할라스터는 나지 네가 아니야."

TextEng: "We'll settle this later, when we're just one on one. But first the Valsharess must suffer for what she has done."
Text: "이건 나중에 둘이서 해결해. 하지만 먼저 발샤레스가 한 짓에 대해 고통받아야 해."

TextEng: "Someone must get her, make her pay for her crime. I'd do it myself, but I can't spare the time."
Text: "누군가 그녀를 잡아서 죄값을 치르게 해야 해. 내가 직접 하겠지만, 시간이 없어."

TextEng: "Nothing much, just a spell to make sure you obey. I put a geas upon you, it's better this way."
Text: "별거 아니야, 네가 복종하게 하는 주문일 뿐. 너한테 기아스를 걸었어, 이게 더 나아."

TextEng: "Down to the Underdark is where you will go. You're working for me now, you can't really say no."
Text: "언더다크로 내려가는 거야. 이제 날 위해 일하는 거야, 거절할 수 없어."

TextEng: "Your dark elven friend speaks words that are true. I think she could help, so I'll send her down, too."
Text: "네 다크 엘프 친구가 하는 말이 맞아. 도움이 될 것 같으니, 그녀도 내려보낼게."

TextEng: "You have no choice but to do as I say. But once the Valsharess is dead, my spell goes away. After that I promise you'll truly be free... but don't do something foolish, like come after me."
Text: "내 말대로 할 수밖에 없어. 하지만 발샤레스가 죽으면 내 주문은 사라져. 그 후엔 정말 자유롭게 해줄게... 하지만 날 쫓아오는 것처럼 바보 같은 짓은 하지 마."

TextEng: "You're sending <FirstName> down into the Underdark? <He/She>'ll have need of my skill in battle. You better send me, as well."
Text: "<FirstName>을(를) 언더다크로 보내는 거야? 전투 기술이 필요할 텐데. 나도 보내는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "You're sending <FirstName> down into the Underdark? <He/She>'ll have need of my healing. You better send me, too."
Text: "<FirstName>을(를) 언더다크로 보내는 거야? 치료가 필요할 텐데. 나도 보내는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "You're sending <FirstName> down into the Underdark? <He/She>'ll have need of my skills. You better send me, too."
Text: "<FirstName>을(를) 언더다크로 보내는 거야? 내 기술이 필요할 텐데. 나도 보내는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "Yer sending <FullName> down into the Underdark? It's full of shadows and traps and treasure! It's like I was born for that place! You better send me down, too!"
Text: "<FullName>을(를) 언더다크로 보내는 거야? 그림자랑 함정이랑 보물이 가득하다고! 그 곳을 위해 태어난 것 같아! 나도 내려보내는 게 좋을 거야!"

TextEng: "No, no, no - it won't work that way! It's up to me if you go or you stay. You don't give me orders here in my home! I'm sending your friend down all alone!"
Text: "안 돼, 안 돼, 안 돼 - 그렇게 안 돼! 네가 가든 남든 내가 결정해. 여긴 내 집이야, 네가 명령하는 거 아니야! 네 친구를 혼자 내려보낼 거야!"

TextEng: "Hey! Deekin not like it when people talk to Boss like that!"
Text: "이봐! 디킨 사람들이 주인님한테 그렇게 말하는 거 싫어!"

TextEng: "Your kobold is brave, though not too bright. Just the kind of ally you might need in this fight."
Text: "네 코볼트는 용감해, 머리는 별론데. 이 싸움에 필요한 종류의 동료야."

TextEng: "I'll send him with you when you go down below. He just might prove useful - you never know."
Text: "네가 내려갈 때 그를 같이 보낼게. 도움이 될지도 모르잖아 - 누가 알아."

TextEng: "Don't say that, Boss! Deekin not let you down! You'll see!"
Text: "그러지 마요, 주인님! 디킨 실망시키지 않을 거예요! 두고 봐요!"

TextEng: "Thanks, Boss! Deekin not let you down! You'll see."
Text: "고마워요, 주인님! 디킨 실망시키지 않을 거예요! 두고 봐요."

TextEng: "I'll send him with you when you go down below. He just might prove useful - you never know."
Text: "네가 내려갈 때 그를 같이 보낼게. 도움이 될지도 모르잖아 - 누가 알아."

TextEng: "<FirstName>'s going to need more help than just that koblod down there. You better send me along, too."
Text: "<FirstName>은(는) 거기서 저 코볼트 말고도 더 도움이 필요할 거야. 나도 보내는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "You don't tell me what to do! I'm in charge here, not you!"
Text: "네가 나한테 지시하지 마! 여긴 내가 책임자야, 네가 아니야!"

TextEng: "I'll send *you* back up to the top. Let Waterdeep know the invasion will stop. I'm cleaning house, the drow are no more. Undermountain will be as it was before."
Text: "*널* 위로 다시 보낼게. 워터딥에 침공이 멈출 거라고 알려. 청소 중이야, 드로우는 더 이상 없어. 언더마운틴은 예전처럼 될 거야."

TextEng: "Please, Halaster. Send me down as well. <FirstName> will need help, and I have allies in the Underdark. The Seer also wants to stop the Valsharess. Please."
Text: "제발, 할라스터. 저도 내려보내 주세요. <FirstName>은(는) 도움이 필요할 거고, 저는 언더다크에 동료가 있어요. 선견자도 발샤레스를 막고 싶어해요. 제발요."

TextEng: "You make a good point, and you asked real nice. Very well, drow, I'll take your advice. You can go, too. I won't leave you here. I'll send you with <FirstName> to the camp of the Seer."
Text: "좋은 지적이고, 예의 바르게 물었어. 좋아, 드로우, 네 조언을 들을게. 너도 가도 돼. 여기 남겨두지 않을게. 선견자의 야영지로 <FirstName>과(와) 함께 보낼게."

TextEng: "Enough time has been wasted, I want you to go. The Valsharess is waiting, far down below."
Text: "시간 낭비는 그만, 이제 가야 해. 발샤레스가 저 밑에서 기다리고 있어."

TextEng: "Goodbye, best wishes, I bid you good luck. Go kill the Valsharess, because until then you're stuck."
Text: "잘 가, 행운을 빌어, 무운을 빈다. 발샤레스를 죽여, 그때까진 너도 꼼짝 못 하니까."

TextEng: "So sorry, no time, you really must go. Don't worry, it's fine, you'll do well, I know."
Text: "미안해, 시간 없어, 정말 가야 해. 걱정 마, 잘할 거야, 알아."

TextEng: "<FullName> will have need of my skill in battle down below. You must send me, as well."
Text: "<FullName>은(는) 아래서 전투할 때 내 실력이 필요할 거야. 나도 보내줘야 해."

TextEng: "If you're sending Deekin along with <FullName>, you better send me, too. My healing skills could be useful down in the Underdark."
Text: "디킨을 <FullName>과(와) 함께 보내려면, 나도 보내는 게 좋을 거야. 언더다크에서 내 치유 기술이 도움이 될 수 있어."

TextEng: "If you're sending the kobold down there, ye better send me too, wizard! The Underdark is full of shadows and traps and treasure! It's like I was born for that place!"
Text: "저 코볼트를 거기로 보낸다면, 나도 보내는 게 좋을 거야, 마법사! 언더다크는 그림자와 함정과 보물로 가득해! 나를 위해 만들어진 곳 같다고!"

TextEng: "What can I say? Everyone knows I'm insane. No doubt you'll know better if this happens again."
Text: "뭐라 할까? 다들 내가 미쳤다는 거 알잖아. 다음에 이런 일 생기면 분명 더 잘 알게 될 거야."

TextEng: "Maybe I should have just left you there."
"Please tell me you aren't speaking in rhyme."
"You were expecting someone else? Who?"
"This was all a trap? You let yourself be captured?"
"Sorry, I didn't know."
"I think I'll be going now."
"I don't have time to listen to you two crackpots!"
Text: "너희 둘 미친 소리 들을 시간 없어!"

TextEng: "Maybe I can help solve this dilemma."
Text: "내가 이 곤란한 상황을 해결하는 데 도움이 될 수도 있어."

TextEng: "Is there some kind of reward for freeing you?"
"Could you guys settle this later?"
"Stop that! What do you think you're doing?"
"What did you just do to me?"
"I guess I don't have any choice but to go after this Valsharess."
Text: "발샤레스를 쫓는 것 외에 다른 선택지가 없는 것 같군."

TextEng: "I'll find some way to break this geas!"
"You can't force me to serve you!"
"I'd rather not have Deekin go with me."
"At least I'll have some help."
"I'm ready. Send me down."
"This isn't over, Halaster."
"Wait. I need time to prepare myself."
"I want to ask you some questions."
"This is the thanks I get for helping you?"

This halfling has a hard, uncompromising look in her eyes. The clothes she wears and her general bearing indicate a successful merchant. There is also a pride in her bearing as she touches her merchandise.
Text: 이 하플링은 눈빛이 냉정하고 단호하다. 옷차림과 전반적인 태도로 보아 성공한 상인임을 알 수 있다. 상품을 만질 때 보이는 자부심도 느껴진다.

TextEng: The unusual red markings on the armor of the drow in Undermountain mark these drow as some sort of community or special clan.
Text: 언더마운틴 드로우 갑옷의 특이한 붉은 무늬는 이들이 어떤 공동체나 특별한 씨족임을 나타낸다.

TextEng: This is one of the powerful wizards who defend Waterdeep from invasion.
Text: 워터딥을 침공으로부터 지키는 강력한 마법사 중 한 명이다.

TextEng: The militia are men, trained specifically for invasions and otehr problems that might be too much for The Guard to handle themselves.
Text: 민병대는 침공 및 경비대만으로 감당하기 어려운 문제들에 대비해 특별히 훈련받은 사람들이다.

TextEng: This dwarf looks as if he could be a fearsome opponent in battle... if he wasn't so drunk.
Text: 이 드워프는 전투에서 무시무시한 상대가 될 수 있어 보인다... 술에 그렇게 취하지 않았다면.

TextEng: This gnome is one of the many adventurers that has answered Waterdeep's call for heroes.
Text: 이 노움은 워터딥의 영웅 모집에 응한 수많은 모험가 중 한 명이다.

TextEng: This man is one of the many adventurers that has answered Waterdeep's call for heroes.
Text: 이 남자는 워터딥의 영웅 모집에 응한 수많은 모험가 중 한 명이다.

TextEng: The Matron Mother of a drow family reigns supreme. The higher a house stands in drow society, the more power a Matron Mother can command.
Text: 드로우 가문의 대모는 최고의 권력을 쥐고 있다. 드로우 사회에서 가문의 지위가 높을수록 대모가 휘두르는 권력도 커진다.

TextEng: Though far from the forest, this druid seems remarkably at ease in her surroundings.
Text: 숲에서 멀리 떨어져 있지만 이 드루이드는 주위 환경에 놀라울 정도로 편안해 보인다.

TextEng: Female priestesses are the pinnacle of drow society, commanding the attention and obedience of all lesser drow.
Text: 여사제들은 드로우 사회의 정점에 있으며 모든 하위 드로우의 주목과 복종을 이끌어낸다.
